name: Strawberry Jam (Fang_Phant0m)
description: When a man comes home from work and realizes he has no bread things go down. Of course, having bread deprivation means you don't think straight at all which of course causes nightmares, obviously. Now you must survive and collect keys to get a butter knife to destroy the bread coming to EAT YOU. Of course, wheat bread is the bread that is coming to get after you, the scariest type of bread. Will you succeed or will Strawberry Jam be splattered everywhere when you perish?
